annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Court-ordered child support payments, arrearages, interception of District income tax refunds of individuals, see § 47-

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 16-137 rewrote the section, which had read as follows: “Remedies provided by this chapter are cumulative and do not affect the availability of remedies under other law.”

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.text: Applicability: Section 3 of D.C. Law 16-137 provided: “This act shall apply as of April 1, 2007.”
Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 104 of the Uniform Interstate Family Support Act (2001 Act).
